additionalValues: Aye Cap'n this will go well in the stable.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} III- Into the Meat and Potatoes
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Time is of the essence.
Commander {Commander.LastName}, the Governor has recovered sufficiently to enable us to better define our next move. Sending you the mission parameters. Rest up, you have three days.
{TGT_FLASHPOINT.Def.Description.Name} IV - Bring your Guns to Town
